item.description:
From Ryles:

NO STATIC played a sold-out show here at RYLE’S in January and dozens of people were turned away at the door. NO STATIC is honored to return for a two-night engagement, serving up tons of STEELY DAN’S timelessly great songs to satisfy the hunger of our ravenous and exceptionally discriminating fans.

We will offer a special feature each night:
Friday night April 26 – a countdown cavalcade of THE HITS
Saturday night April 27 – the amazing “GAUCHO” album complete(From Kirk: I'm posting Saturday night only. Perhaps another organizer will post Friday night!)

…and of course each night will include many other deep cuts and surprises…

Get your tickets NOW!!!

www.NoStaticBand.com

Tickets can be obtained via the link below:

http://ryles.interticket.com/arrivalorder.php?eid=2724&aid=4&vid=4

Jan 26th they sold out!

The band starts at 9:00pm.
item.how_to_find_us: I have a meetup button/will give out Cell Phone # the night before.
item.name: No Static Band at Ryles 4/27 at 8pm
